sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.RteEntityOperationSourceFieldRefQualifier</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>RteEntityOperationSourceFieldRefQualifier</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var RteEntityOperationSourceFieldRefQualifier = Class.create();
RteEntityOperationSourceFieldRefQualifier.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    getCondition: function(current) {
        var path = current.sys_rte_eb_entity.path;
        var condition = 'sys_rte_eb_definition=' + current.sys_rte_eb_definition +
            '^sys_rte_eb_entity=' + current.sys_rte_eb_entity;

        if (!path)
            return condition;

        var arr = path.split(".");
        var parentPath = "";
        var i;
        for (i = 0; i < arr.length - 1; i++) {
            if (i == 0)
                parentPath = arr[i];
            else
                parentPath += "." + arr[i];
            condition += "^ORsys_rte_eb_entity.path=" + parentPath;
        }
       
        return condition;
    },

    type: 'RteEntityOperationSourceFieldRefQualifier'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>maint</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-04-14 17:17:24</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>1484b6eb23881010e9d4f4c947bf6518</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>20</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>RteEntityOperationSourceFieldRefQualifier</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Robust Transform Engine" source="com.glide.robust_transform_engine">9f5434e83c31311068bcf327dfe37f66</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1484b6eb23881010e9d4f4c947bf6518</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>maint</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-04-16 18:58:20</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
